A cardboard box can be used as a DIY storage container for small items. Simply cut holes in the box and line it with fabric or paper to protect the items.
A cardboard box can be used as a makeshift doghouse for small dogs. Simply cut holes in the box and paint it to match your dog's favorite color.
A cardboard box can be used as a DIY birdhouse. Simply cut holes in the box and paint it with bright colors to attract birds.
A cardboard box can be used as a makeshift fort for children. Simply cut holes in the box and let the kids decorate it with markers and stickers.
A cardboard box can be used as a DIY cat scratching post. Simply attach some rope or carpet to the box and let the cat scratch away.
